basic_info.description: I'm Aaron, a committed and ambitious full stack developer holding a Master's degree in Computer Science, with a specialization in React and Angular-based projects. My expertise extends across various industries, such as entertainment, energy, and financial services, where I have consistently demonstrated my ability to construct inventive solutions. In my most recent endeavor, I successfully brought to life an international payment flow concept, facilitating seamless currency conversion and enabling international bank customers to initiate payments effortlessly. I thrive as a proactive problem-solver, possessing a natural inclination to take ownership of my work assignments. Fueled by a passion for overcoming challenges and delivering top-notch results, I am eagerly seeking fresh opportunities to add value and further advance my professional journey.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
